title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 83.3 - Review by board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 83.3 - Review by board

State Regulations

If upon review of the report of the professional conduct
officer, such board or subcommittee concludes that a certified individual's
moral character is adequate to permit continued certification as a teacher, or
that an applicant's moral character is adequate to permit certification as a
teacher, a report to this effect shall be forwarded by the board or
subcommittee to the executive director of the Office of Teaching Initiatives. If upon such review, the board or subcommittee concludes that a substantial
question exists as to the moral character of a certified individual or an
applicant, notice of the basis for this conclusion and a copy of this Part
shall be sent by certified mail, return receipt requested, to the certified
individual or applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
83.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
